name: V8 Racing Game
description:
V8 Racing is an old school top down / view ( overhead ) racing game. V8 Racing game brings back old school arcade type racing with all the mechanics of real racing added to give you a unique and immerse racing game experience.

Take on the best around the world in multiplayer, race friends or top the leaderboards.

Play a single race or take on the championship mode where you can win coins in these supercars. includes practice sessions, Qualifying sessions, contracts with teams, pitstops for fuel and tyres. Super bonuses for cars await in V8 Racing Game

Limited time new release offer, receive 10,000 free in game coins to spend on contracts in game.

Features:
* Multiplayer - Take on the best around the world, or challenge friends!
* Single Race - Play a single race weekend
* Championship - Take on the championship to become the V8 Racing champion!
* 13 Cars / Teams to choose from all with their own speed and handling
* 10 Race Tracks / Circuits to race on
* *Great HD visuals
* Dynamic Weather
* Dynamic fuel and PITSTOPS!
* Track Map

+ MUCH MORE!!!

V8 Racing using a simple control system so you can pick it up straight away and become a V8 Racing Legend and start enjoying the game!
